text: Eive Factor Trait Theory (Costa and McCrae) OCEAN Openness to new experiences — people who score high on openness tend to be imaginative, creative, curious, and prefer variety Neuroticism Openness Conscientiousness — the degree to which one is aware and attentive to other people, the details of the task, or both Extraversion — degree to which one’s energy is directed inward or outward : Agrasablaness Extraversion Agreeableness — degree to which one gets along with others Neuroticism — degree to which one is emotionally stable or et R i COnSClentioueness s unstable 3 ' '
